titleStmt.title: A proclamation for discovering and apprehending such as rob the pacquets.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to their most excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms in ornamental border at head of text; initial letter.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the nineteenth day of August, one thousand six hundred and ninety, and of Our Reign the second year.
Signed: Gilb. Eliot Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Imperfect: uneven print; torn with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
